Render record as simple list with previous / next page buttons

```js
<ModelFetchList model={UserModel} defaultPageSize={5}>
    {({ records, gotoPage, currentPage, pageSize, totalPages }) => (
        <DelimitedList vertical>
            {records.map(record => `${record.email}`)}
            <DelimitedList>
                <span>Page {currentPage} of  {totalPages}</span>
                <Button disabled={currentPage === 1} onClick={() => gotoPage(currentPage - 1, pageSize)}>Previous Page</Button>
                <Button disabled={currentPage === totalPages} onClick={() => gotoPage(currentPage + 1, pageSize)}>Next Page</Button>
            </DelimitedList>
        </DelimitedList>
    )}
</ModelFetchList>
```
